author: Jamie Bartlett
title: Transhumanists are on a quest to discover eternal life. Is the citizen science they use the future of technology?
text: Transhumanists are on a quest to discover eternal life. Is the citizen science they use the future of technology? Immortality aside, DIY "bio-hacking" could provide solutions to everyday problems, despite the risks involved More human than human: a bionic man Photo: CHANNEL 4 By Jamie Bartlett
